items.name: Panzenella
items.description: Italy's delicious dish with tuscan chopped salad of soaked stale bread, onions and tomatoes.

items.name: Pasta Carbonara
items.description: Pasta Carbonara is the ultimate cheesy dish that you would love to indulge in!

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Typical Neapolitan pizza, made with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt and extra-virgin olive oil.

items.name: Bruschetta
items.description: At its best, bruschetta is light and crisp, covered in deep red tomatoes and full of fresh flavor

items.name: Biriyani
items.description: Aromatic Indian rice dish made by cooking basmati rice with mix veggies, herbs & biryani spices

items.name: Samosa
items.description: Deep fried pastry with a spiced filling usually made with potatoes, spices and herbs

items.name: Momo
items.description: Steamed dumplings stuffed with a lightly spiced vegetable filling

items.name: Kheer
items.description: Mouth watering Indian rice pudding made with only three basic ingredients- rice, milk and sugar

items.name: Tofu
items.description: Chinese recipe with an interesting mix of lemon grass, shallots, red onion, chili paste, et al

items.name: Manchau soup
items.description: An authentic Chinese Savour with spicy flavours of the vegetable manchow soup

items.name: Hakka Noodles
items.description: Tossed with your favourite veggies like capsicum, carrot, spring onions and cabbage in the eclectic mix of sauces

items.name: Crunchy Iceberg Dumpling
items.description: Pamper your taste buds with the fresh and juicy goodness of asparagus and corn kernels
